name: technician

effect.x-y: struggle is unaffected. helping hand and defense curl are not taken into account.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: struggle is unaffected. helping hand and defense curl are not taken into account.

short_effect: Strengthens moves of 60 base power or less to 1.5× their power.

flavor_text.x-y: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.
